name: One Man Chit-Chat
description:
Our character performs a ritual with his friends who dare him to perform the ritual first. He performs "one man chit-chat" and talks with an evil spirit entity. The spirit talks with our main character and takes him into another realm and turns all of his friends into their comfort object as a child.


He takes him inside a nightmare realm where all his fears come to fruition as he wanders his high school halls trying to escape. Our character ventures forth to find his friends and use them to aid in his adventure to defeat the evil spirit.

Controls:
Movement: WASD

Interaction: E

Companion uses: 1,2,3
Rabbit Shoot: B
Space Bar: Skip Cinematic / continue with cinematic
